Trackify is a secure and innovative mobile application designed to enhance the existing system for recording, tracking, and managing student violations within the academic institution.
By using Trackify, you agree to comply with these terms:

Authorized Personnel Only: Access to Trackify is restricted to authorized personnel who have been granted specific permissions to manage student violations. Unauthorized access or use of the app is strictly prohibited.
Data Protection: We employ robust security measures, including encryption and regular security audits, to protect your data from unauthorized access and breaches.

No Unauthorized Use: Users are prohibited from using Trackify for any unauthorized or illegal activities. This includes, but is not limited to, unauthorized access to student data, data manipulation, and any activities that violate institutional policies or legal regulations.

Service Changes: Trackify reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate the service, or any part of it, at any time without prior notice. Users will be notified of significant changes through official communication channels.
We prioritize your privacy. This policy covers:
Personal Information: We collect personal information necessary for the provision of our services. This includes user identification, contact details, and information related to student violations.

Service Improvement: The information collected is used to manage student violations effectively and to continuously improve our services. This includes analyzing data to enhance app functionality and user experience.

Encryption: We utilize robust encryption protocols to ensure that your data is protected during transmission and storage. Regular security updates and audits are conducted to maintain the highest level of data security.

No Unauthorized Sharing: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent, except when required by law. Any data sharing for legal compliance will be done in accordance with applicable regulations.

Access and Control: Users have the right to access, correct, or delete their personal information stored in Trackify. Requests for data access or modification can be made through the app’s support channels.
